translations: v.挂钩（hook 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: She latched on to his arm, hooking her other arm around a tree.
sentences.translation: 她一只手抓住他的胳膊，另一只胳膊抱住一棵树。

sentences.sentence: Apple stands to win as well, hooking more young consumers with decades of technology purchases ahead of them.
sentences.translation: 苹果也将赢得胜利，它将吸引更多的年轻消费者购买未来几十年的科技产品。

sentences.sentence: Couch surfers tend to see themselves as part of a tribe; unlike two people hooking up at a bar, they meet under an altruistic premise.
sentences.translation: 沙发冲浪者视自己为一个部落的成员；不像在酒吧里面邂逅的两个人，他们是在利他主义的前提下相遇。
